attributes.action: Urge the BBC to kept on showing the drama series Lilies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is for the BBC  to take into account the wishes of its viewers into gaving a second chance to the drama series Lilies and make at lease another series of the same.  There is a growing number of angry views on their own Points of Views Messageboard with at lease 1000 messages asking for this.  However in the last few hours the BBC has close the first two threads for no given reasons. There are also other messageboards opening in the internet with at lease 90% of messages calling on the BBC to do so. Many of the people have email the bosses of the BBC who reply with a standard email back.  Seing as we the taxpayers paid for the BBC is it not wrong that the BBC takes no accounts its viewers.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
